committees.title: Audit and Standards Committee
committees.purpose: The Audit & Standards Committee ensures good quality corporate governance.

committees.title: Community Services and Licensing Committee
committees.purposeSuggested: Suggested: Exercises the Council's licensing and related enforcement functions (and/or sub-committee hearings) within the relevant statutory framework.

committees.title: Council
committees.purposeSuggested: Suggested: Full Council setting the budget and policy framework and taking key decisions reserved to Council, including appointments and constitutional matters.

committees.title: Development Control Committee
committees.purposeSuggested: Suggested: Determines planning and development applications that are reserved to committee, considering policy compliance and officer recommendations.

committees.title: Environment Committee
committees.purposeSuggested: Suggested: Oversees environmental policy, climate change initiatives, waste management, and sustainability strategies.

committees.title: Housing Committee
committees.purposeSuggested: Suggested: Oversees housing policy, homelessness services, council housing management, and housing strategy delivery.

committees.title: Licensing Sub-Committee
committees.purposeSuggested: Suggested: Exercises the Council's licensing and related enforcement functions (and/or sub-committee hearings) within the relevant statutory framework.

committees.title: Standards Sub-Committee
committees.purposeSuggested: Suggested: Supports and determines matters relating to member conduct and standards, including hearings/panels where applicable.

committees.title: Strategy and Resources Committee
committees.purposeSuggested: Suggested: Oversees strategic direction, financial planning, budget management, and resource allocation across the council's operations.

committees.title: Constitution
committees.purposeSuggested: Suggested: Maintains and oversees the Council's Constitution and associated governance arrangements, ensuring it remains current and fit for purpose.
